description: The inventory dashboard displays reports with data for each data center, and for each cluster ( hosts, configured vms, CPU, memory and disk usage )

panels.content: ###### This dashboard displays inventory reports with details for each data center, and for each cluster.

panels.description: This report displays for each data center the number of hosts and configured virtual machines.

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-1 - This query returns the
-- average number of hosts and configured VMs 
-- in each data center

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    SUM ( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
    SUM ( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms,
    SUM ( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms 
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            COALESCE ( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
            num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
            num_of_vms.total_configured_vms
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    vm_count.cluster_id,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
                                ELSE 0
                            END
                        ) AS num_of_running_vms,
                    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
                FROM 
                    (
                        SELECT
                            a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
                            hourly_daily.vm_status AS vm_status,
                            COUNT ( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
                        FROM 
                            (
                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                UNION
                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                            ) AS hourly_daily
                            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                                ON 
                                    (
                                        a.vm_id =
                                        hourly_daily.vm_id
                                    )
                        WHERE
                            hourly_daily.history_id 
                                IN 
                                    (
                                        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                        FROM 
                                            (
                                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                                UNION
                                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                            ) AS b
                                        GROUP BY vm_id
                                    )
                        GROUP BY a.cluster_id, hourly_daily.vm_status
                    ) AS vm_count
                GROUP BY cluster_id
            ) AS num_of_vms
                ON 
                    (
		                num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
        GROUP BY
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
            num_of_vms.total_configured_vms
    ) AS dc
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description

panels.title: Data Center Inventory (IN01-1)

panels.description: This report displays CPU usage and overcommit for each data center.

styles.alias: Running VMS - CPU Cores vs. Total Hosts - Number of CPUs

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-2 - This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores, Physical Memory and disk usage
-- for the vms in each data center.

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
    SUM ( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
    SUM ( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) = 0 
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( total_vms_cpu_cores ) / SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) )
    END AS "cpu_over_commit",
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( cpu_cores_running ) / SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) )
    END AS "cpu_usage_ratio"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            COALESCE ( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            CASE
                WHEN count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                    THEN SUM ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_threads, 0 ) ) 
                ELSE SUM ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores, 0 ) )
            END AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
            cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    a.cluster_id,
                    SUM 
                        ( 
                            COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket, 0 ) *
                            COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets, 0 ) 
                        ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN hourly_daily.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets, 0 )
                                ELSE 0
                            END
                        ) AS cpu_cores_running
                FROM
                    ( 
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_vms
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_configuration_version
                            )
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                        ON 
                            (
                                a.vm_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    hourly_daily.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                FROM 
                                    (
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                        UNION
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                    ) AS b
                                GROUP BY vm_id
                            )
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id
            ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
                ON 
                    (
                        cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
        GROUP BY
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
            cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
            count_threads_as_cores
    ) AS dc
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description

panels.title: CPU Usage and Overcommit (IN01-2)

panels.description: This report displays memory usage and overcommit for each data center.

styles.alias: Running VMs - Memory vs. Total Hosts - Memory

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-3 - This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores, Physical Memory and disk usage
-- for the vms in each data center.

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) AS total_hosts_mem,
    SUM ( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
    SUM ( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( total_vms_mem ) / SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) )
    END AS "memory_over_commit",
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( mem_running ) / SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) ) 
    END AS "memory_usage_ratio"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            COALESCE( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS total_hosts_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    a.cluster_id,
                    SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS total_vms_mem,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN hourly_daily.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024
                                ELSE 0.00
                            END 
                        ) AS mem_running
                FROM
                    ( 
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_vms
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_configuration_version
                            )
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                        ON 
                            (
                                a.vm_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    hourly_daily.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                FROM 
                                    ( 
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                        UNION
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                    ) AS b
                                GROUP BY vm_id
                            )
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id
            ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
                ON 
                    (
                        cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
        GROUP BY
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running
    ) AS dc
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description

panels.title: Memory Usage and Overcommit (IN01-3)

panels.description: This report displays disk usage and overcommit for each data center.

styles.alias: VMs Used Disk Size vs. Total Disk Size

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-4 - This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores, Physical Memory and disk usage
-- for the vms in each data center.

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb ,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb,
    CASE 
        WHEN dc_total_disk_size_gb = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( vms_allocated_disk_size_gb / dc_total_disk_size_gb ) 
    END AS "disk_over_commit",
    CASE    
        WHEN dc_total_disk_size_gb = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( vm_disk_actual_size_gb / dc_total_disk_size_gb ) 
    END AS "disk_usage_ratio"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            COALESCE( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
            dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
            dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
            CAST ( vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb  AS float ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
            CAST ( vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb AS float ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    datacenter_id,
                    SUM (hourly_daily.used_disk_size_gb) AS dc_used_disk_size_gb,
                    SUM (hourly_daily.available_disk_size_gb) AS dc_available_disk_size_gb,
                    SUM (hourly_daily.available_disk_size_gb + hourly_daily.used_disk_size_gb) AS dc_total_disk_size_gb
                FROM 
                    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                                v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
                            )
                    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
                    (
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                                hourly_daily.storage_domain_id
                                AND hourly_daily.history_id 
                                    IN 
                                        (
                                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                            FROM
                                                (
                                                    SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_hourly
                                                    UNION
                                                    SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_storage_domains_resources_usage_daily
                                                ) AS a
                                            GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
                                        )
                            )
                WHERE
                    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
                    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
                GROUP BY datacenter_id
            ) AS dc_storage
                ON 
                    (
                        dc_storage.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    datacenter_id,
                    SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
                    SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( hourly_daily.vm_disk_actual_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS vm_disk_actual_size_gb
                FROM 
                    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
                            )
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms_disks
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id =
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_vms_disks.storage_domain_id
                            )
                    LEFT OUTER JOIN 
                    (
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_latest_configuration_vms_disks.vm_disk_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_disk_id
                                AND hourly_daily.history_id 
                                    IN 
                                        (
                                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                            FROM 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_hourly
                                                    UNION
                                                    SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_disks_resources_usage_daily
                                                ) AS a
                                            GROUP BY a.vm_disk_id
                                        )
                            )
                WHERE
                    -- Here we filter by the "Data" storage type
                    storage_domain_type IN ( 0, 1 )
                GROUP BY datacenter_id
            ) AS vms_storage
                ON 
                    (
                        vms_storage.datacenter_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id
                    )
        WHERE v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
        GROUP BY
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
            tag_name,
            datacenter_name,
            datacenter_description,
            dc_storage.dc_used_disk_size_gb,
            dc_storage.dc_available_disk_size_gb,
            dc_storage.dc_total_disk_size_gb,
            vms_storage.vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
            vms_storage.vm_disk_actual_size_gb
    ) AS dc
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    tag_name,
    datacenter_name,
    datacenter_description,
    dc_used_disk_size_gb,
    dc_available_disk_size_gb,
    dc_total_disk_size_gb,
    vms_allocated_disk_size_gb,
    vm_disk_actual_size_gb

panels.title: Disk Usage and Overcommit (IN01-4)

panels.description: This report displays for each cluster the number of hosts and configured virtual machines.

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-5 - This query returns the
-- number of hosts and configured VMs 
-- in each cluster

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description,
    SUM ( number_of_hosts ) AS number_of_hosts,
    SUM ( total_configured_vms ) AS total_configured_vms,
    SUM ( num_of_running_vms ) AS num_of_running_vms 
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            COALESCE ( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            COUNT( DISTINCT host_id ) AS number_of_hosts,
            num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
            num_of_vms.total_configured_vms
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    vm_count.cluster_id,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN vm_count.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN vm_count.num_of_vms
                                ELSE 0
                            END
                        ) AS num_of_running_vms,
                    SUM ( vm_count.num_of_vms ) AS total_configured_vms
                FROM 
                    (
                        SELECT
                            a.cluster_id AS cluster_id,
                            hourly_daily.vm_status AS vm_status,
                            COUNT ( DISTINCT a.vm_id ) AS num_of_vms
                        FROM 
                            (
                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                UNION
                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                            ) AS hourly_daily
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                                ON 
                                    (
                                        a.vm_id =
                                        hourly_daily.vm_id
                                    )
                        WHERE
                            hourly_daily.history_id 
                                IN 
                                    (
                                        SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                        FROM 
                                            (
                                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                                UNION
                                                SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                            ) AS b
                                        GROUP BY vm_id
                                    )
                        GROUP BY a.cluster_id, hourly_daily.vm_status
                    ) AS vm_count
                GROUP BY cluster_id
            ) AS num_of_vms
                ON 
                    (
		                    num_of_vms.cluster_id =
		                    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            num_of_vms.num_of_running_vms,
            num_of_vms.total_configured_vms
    ) AS sub_query
WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description

panels.title: Cluster Inventory (IN01-5)

panels.description: This report displays CPU usage and overcommit for each cluster.

styles.alias: Running VMS - CPU Cores vs. Total Hosts - Number of CPUs

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-6 - This query returns the
-- number of CPU Cores, Physical Memory and disk usage
-- for the vms in each cluster.

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description,
    SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus) AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
    SUM ( total_vms_cpu_cores ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
    SUM ( cpu_cores_running ) AS cpu_cores_running,
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) = 0 
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( total_vms_cpu_cores ) / SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) )
    END AS "cpu_over_commit",
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( cpu_cores_running ) / SUM ( total_hosts_num_of_cpus ) )
    END AS "cpu_usage_ratio"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            COALESCE ( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            CASE
                WHEN count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                    THEN SUM ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_threads, 0 ) ) 
                ELSE SUM ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.number_of_cores, 0 ) )
            END AS total_hosts_num_of_cpus,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
            cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running
        FROM 
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    a.cluster_id,
                    SUM 
                        ( 
                            COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket, 0 ) *
                            COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets, 0 ) 
                        ) AS total_vms_cpu_cores,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN hourly_daily.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.cpu_per_socket, 0 ) * COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.number_of_sockets, 0 )
                                ELSE 0
                            END
                        ) AS cpu_cores_running
                FROM
                    ( 
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_vms
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_configuration_version
                            )
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                        ON 
                            (
                                a.vm_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    hourly_daily.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                FROM 
                                    (
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                        UNION
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                    ) AS b
                                GROUP BY vm_id
                            )
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id
            ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
                ON 
                    (
                        cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_cpu_cores,
            cpu_memory_allocation.cpu_cores_running,
            count_threads_as_cores
    ) AS dc
WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description

panels.title: CPU Usage and Overcommit (IN01-6)

panels.description: This report displays memory usage and overcommit for each cluster.

styles.alias: Running VMs - Memory vs. Total Hosts - Memory

targets.rawSql:
-- IN01-7 - This query returns the
-- average number of CPU Cores, Physical Memory and disk usage
-- for the vms in each data center.

SELECT
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description,
    SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) AS total_hosts_mem,
    SUM ( total_vms_mem ) AS total_vms_mem,
    SUM ( mem_running ) AS mem_running,
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( total_vms_mem ) / SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) )
    END AS "memory_over_commit",
    CASE
        WHEN SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE ( SUM ( mem_running ) / SUM ( total_hosts_mem ) ) 
    END AS "memory_usage_ratio"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            COALESCE( tag_name, 'Unknown' ) AS tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS total_hosts_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running
        FROM  
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_relations
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_id
                        AND v4_4_latest_tags_relations.entity_type = 3
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_tags_details
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_tags_relations.parent_id =
                        v4_4_latest_tags_details.tag_id
                    )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN 
            (
                SELECT
                    a.cluster_id,
                    SUM ( CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024 ) AS total_vms_mem,
                    SUM 
                        (
                            CASE
                                WHEN hourly_daily.vm_status = 1
                                    THEN CAST ( COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_vms.memory_size_mb, 0 ) AS float ) / 1024
                                ELSE 0.00
                            END 
                        ) AS mem_running
                FROM
                    ( 
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                    ) AS hourly_daily
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_vms
                        ON 
                            (
                                v4_4_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_configuration_version
                            )
                    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms a
                        ON 
                            (
                                a.vm_id =
                                hourly_daily.vm_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    hourly_daily.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( history_id )
                                FROM 
                                    ( 
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
                                        UNION
                                        SELECT * FROM v4_4_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
                                    ) AS b
                                GROUP BY vm_id
                            )
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id
            ) AS cpu_memory_allocation
                ON 
                    (
                        cpu_memory_allocation.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        GROUP BY
            datacenter_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            tag_name,
            cluster_name,
            cluster_description,
            cpu_memory_allocation.total_vms_mem,
            cpu_memory_allocation.mem_running
    ) AS dc
WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
GROUP BY
    datacenter_id,
    cluster_id,
    tag_name,
    cluster_name,
    cluster_description

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE
        WHEN $count_datacenter_id_url = 1
            THEN '-storage;name=' || datacenter_name
        ELSE NULL
    END
FROM v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
